title: [Hidden Plateau]
description: Snow-capped mountain peaks rise up to the south, glinting softly in the night's light.  Near the path, foliage has started creeping up the surface of a bronze dwarf statue, broken and resting on its side.

Snow-capped mountain peaks rise up to the south, shining brightly in the sun's light.  Near the path, foliage has started creeping up the surface of a bronze dwarf statue, broken and shoved on its side.
